jchess.gui

Class GUIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gui.GUIManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGUIHandle, IGUIManager, INewGameListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GUIManagerTest

    public class GUIManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGUIManager, IGUIHandle
    Implements IGUIManager. Its main responsibility is to manage GUI related operations.
    Since:
    14 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
